short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends pause/resume command to a suitable client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connecting to your call recording client, this extension allows a user to easily Pause and Resume your call recording with the click of a button, used when obtaining sensitive or private information. Pause and Resume Recordings can be set up to automatically pause call recordings when the user browses to certain webpages.
